title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Field-Based Project Learning Applying Geospatial Science

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collect field survey data using GPS and mobile devices.
Learners can process collected geospatial data with GIS software to create spatial analysis reports (PDF/presentation).
Learners can collaborate with team members to build and maintain an integrated spatial database.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
